form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 PLACE M DICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS NEW DELHI FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo. Day, Yr.) 8/26/91 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at NEW DELHI INDIA NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX DEVI KASTURI (Mo., Day, Yr.) F M I certify that on the above date I examined 3-4-04 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON A 452632 BAREILLY 11th,Mar.91 GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Gonorrhea Tuberculosis, Not Active Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease Mental Retardation or Disability: Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm INHOMOGENOUS OPACITIES ARE PRESENT IN RIGHT UPPER AND Not Done LOWER ZONE. CALCIFIED LESIONS ARE PRESENT IN THE RIGHT HILER REGION. DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DR. AGGARWAL 26th,Aug'91 DATE READ SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate treatment under Remarks) Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: VDRL ELISA ME HOD DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY DR. N.P.S. CHAWLA 26th,Aug'91 DR. N.P.S. CHAWLA 26th, Aug 91 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS CLASS B2: T.B. NOT ACTIVE? NOT INFECTIOUS. SPUTUM SMEAR FOR AFB X 3 -NEGATIVE. DEFECTIVE VISION B/L CATARACT. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'SSIGNATURED DATE DR. N.P.S. CHAWLA for me 28th, Aug 91 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 V50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 *U.S. Government Printing Office:1989-250-926/00306 REVISED 2-88 DEPT. OF STATE
